t: Charlotte Pipe and Foundry Company - Wikipedia
s: April 3, 2025 - The company studied the merits ... plastic pipes, opened a facility to produce them in 1967 in Union County. In 1992, the firm began producing industrial plastics. In 2022 the company purchased Neenah Foundry, an iron castings firm based in Wisconsin. In 2023 the company relocated its main foundry operations out of Charlotte to a new facility ...

s: In 1901 W. Frank Dowd recognized the need for plumbing pipe in the newly industrialized, post-war South. To answer this need he built a small foundry in Charlotte, North Carolina to produce cast iron soil pipe and fittings.
